data.prayer: Father, it’s possible most of the 196,471 lost people in  Perlis, Malaysia have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Perlis, Malaysia
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, give the disciples of the the state of Perlis an urgency of seeing every people and place reached for the gospel.
data.verse: As long as it is day, we must do the works of him who sent me. Night is coming, when no one can work.

data.section_summary: On average, 45 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Perlis, Malaysia.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.
Spirit, fill the 217,500 souls living in the state of Perlis with a taste for your Word. Make it sweet as honey in their mouth.
data.verse: How sweet are your words to my taste, sweeter than honey to my mouth!

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in Perlis, Malaysia to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Lanoh people. Make the Lanoh people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Please, teach the 7,653 believers in Perlis, Malaysia how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.

data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 209,847 lost in Perlis that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 7,653 believers in the state of Perlis to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.

location.name: Perlis
location.people_groups_list: Mah Meri, Besisi, Orang Kanaq, Pashtun, Northern, Kensiu, Murik Kayan
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Mah Meri, Besisi (4,000), Orang Kanaq (200), Pashtun, Northern (6,000), Kensiu (300), Murik Kayan (3,000)
